meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ongoing.
meanings.sent1: The ongoingness of the project kept everyone busy.
meanings.sent2: The ongoingness of the rain made the roads slippery.
meanings.sent3: The ongoingness of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ongoingness of the river symbolized the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The ongoingness of the music filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The continuation or persistence of something.
meanings.sent1: The ongoingness of the argument was tiresome.
meanings.sent2: The ongoingness of the tradition brought comfort to the family.
meanings.sent3: The ongoingness of the mystery kept everyone guessing.
meanings.sent4: The ongoingness of the marathon tested the runners' endurance.
meanings.sent5: The ongoingness of the painting captured the artist's dedication.
